Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Archer
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Archer due to a door problem on train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Archer due to a door problem on train. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
